mapper.delete: delete from tbl_batch_task_scheduler where task_name=#{taskName} and group_name=#{groupName}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_batch_task_scheduler (group_name, task_name, task_type, task_desc, task_cron, task_previous_fire_time, task_next_fire_time, contact_email, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskCron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskPreviousFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskNextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tbl_batch_task_scheduler set group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_type = #{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_desc = #{taskDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_cron = #{taskCron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_previous_fire_time = #{taskPreviousFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, task_next_fire_time = #{taskNextFireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_email = #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, group_name, task_name, task_type, task_desc, task_cron, task_previous_fire_time, task_next_fire_time, contact_email, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from tbl_batch_task_scheduler where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id_, group_name, task_name, task_type, task_desc, task_cron, task_previous_fire_time, task_next_fire_time, contact_email, enable_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from tbl_batch_task_scheduler
